title: Only start sccache in foreground mode when in build phase
body_html: This aims to fix the test timeout error for multi-gpu tests (example: https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda8-cudnn6-py3-multigpu-test/2617/) because it takes a long time for sccache server to shut down. With this PR, the multi-gpu tests should be back to normal and should only take ~5mins to finish.
body_text: This aims to fix the test timeout error for multi-gpu tests (example: https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda8-cudnn6-py3-multigpu-test/2617/) because it takes a long time for sccache server to shut down. With this PR, the multi-gpu tests should be back to normal and should only take ~5mins to finish.
body: This aims to fix the test timeout error for multi-gpu tests (example: https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda8-cudnn6-py3-multigpu-test/2617/) because it takes a long time for sccache server to shut down. With this PR, the multi-gpu tests should be back to normal and should only take ~5mins to finish.
